overview: Follow the sexploits of Jayden and Samantha - two oversexed, lingerie shop employees - who start up their own private lingerie "out call" business. Along with an ensemble of beautiful college girls, they give the term "home delivery" an entirely new meaning. Don't delay pick up the phone (and a box of tissues) and make an appointment with the sexiest sluts in XXX!
title: By Appt. Only
